block.name: Sample and Hold
block.doc: Implements a sample-and-hold operation. When the ctrl input is non-zero, the signal on the in terminal passes to the out terminal. When the ctrl input is zero, the current value on the out terminal is held until the ctrl input is non-zero.

param.name: Type
param.doc: Sets the datatype for the input and output streams.

option.name: Float
option.doc: Sets the input and output streams to real.

option.name: Int
option.doc: Sets the input and output streams to 32-bit integer.

option.name: Short
option.doc: Sets the input and output streams to 16-bit integer.

option.name: Byte
option.doc: Sets the input and output streams to 8-bit byte.
